name: CompAInion (ArcticCerf)
description:
CompAInion is a puzzle game where you alter the level in order to help your little AI friend exit the CompAInion Research Facility and lead him home safe.

Also, whoopsies. It looks like your little CompAInion has swallowed a truckload of explosives and will explode when it bumps into walls! What a classic!

CONTROLS:

Use the mouse to drag around elements with a green glow.

Click on the AI Player and it will start walking it's predetermined path!

ELEMENTS:

Boxes: Boxes can be pushed onto the button by the AI Player

Buttons: Buttons open the door coresponding to the shape displayed on them

Pause Tile: Pause tiles stop the player and make you reenter edit mode

Exit Door: The end of the Level


Have fun! :3
